Package server

Class IdServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
server.IdServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, IdServerMember, Id
public class IdServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Id, Serializable, IdServerMember
The IdServer class is used as a driver class for the server.
See Also:

    • createAccount

      public String createAccount(String loginName, String realName, String password, String ip) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: Id
      Creates a new User object using the passed parameter and adds that User object to the server database if the given loginName is avaiable, and returns a String containing a helpful message indicating whether the operation was successful or not.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      loginName - Login-name of the User.
      realName - Legal-name of the User.

    • changeLoginName

      public String changeLoginName(String currentLoginName, String updatedLoginName, String password) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: Id
      Find the User entry in the server database that has credentials matching the currentLoginName and password parameters and update that user's login-name with the given updatedLoginName parameter. A String is returned indicating whether the operation was successful or not.
      Specified by:
      changeLoginName in interface Id
      Parameters:
      currentLoginName - the login-name of the account to be updated
      updatedLoginName - the new login-name to update the account with
      password - the password of the user account
      Returns:
      String operationResult
      Throws:
      RemoteException
